entities.description: Use of alcohol to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Use of substances other than alcohol to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Efforts to use stimulants, feel effects, or get over effects of stimulants in the past 12 months.
Efforts to get or try to get prescription stimulants in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent used alcohol to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent used substances other than alcohol to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent spent a great deal of time using or feeling the effects of stimulants in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent spent a great deal of time getting or trying to get prescription stimulants in the past 12 months.
